name: Another Night (Blackberry Mochi)
description:
Another Night is a fan-game based off of NomnomNami's Syrup and the Ultimate Sweet, as well as the demo of its in-development sequel, about a specific night in the life of a specific candy golem. Join her on a quest to not be bored, or something along those lines?? Made for Gumdrop's birthday, 2022!!

Content warning: depictions of self-hate and discussions of suicide.

There are references of/spoilers for the Candy RPG demo in this game, but it should also still be perfectly understandable without having played through that. There are references of/spoilers for the Lonely Wolf Treat games, as well.

Also, this game does not have music. It does have some ambience and some sound effects, however. I would recommend putting something soft and peaceful to play it to, such as this very non-specific track.

It takes around 30-90 minutes to get to the end. Hopefully you enjoy it, if you decide to give it a play through!!

Story & Art by Blackberry Mochi, Characters & Setting belong to NomnomNami

Additional Characters belong to npckc and Team Shanghai Alice
